then.line: Old string cheese..?
Old string cheese.
Yeah! It's...short side to side and tall up and down. And it's the oldest of them all!
You believe the answer to my ancient riddle is "old string cheese".
Is it not?
Your answer is acknowledged. It will form the basis of your prophecy.
Prophecy? Is... it a prophecy about where Minty is?
Yes.
Well, okay... What's the next part?
With no light, I shine bright. Squint your eyes before my might.
WHAT AM I?!
A tree planted by a happy child!
First it's small, then it's tall... and it's...
How is it the oldest of them all?
Hmmm.
The kid is a caveman?
...Very well. Your answer is acknowledged. It will form the basis of your prophecy.
So I was right?
You gave the answer as your spirit bade you.
Okay...So then what's the next part of my prophecy?
With no light, I shine bright. Squint your eyes before my might.
WHAT AM I?!
I think.... you're the threads of fate. As short as a life well-lived.... as long as eternity...
And as old as the first flicker of conscious thought.
Is that it?
There is no "it". There is only what you believe.
Oh cool! So I'm right no matter what!
Your answer is acknowledged. And it will form the basis of your prophecy.
Ooh, I get a prophecy?
One that will guide you to the location of the minted one. Now answer this:
With no light, I shine bright. Squint your eyes before my might.
WHAT AM I?!
